title: boards are dead and the reason is a joke,riots incompetence is beyond belief.
body:
boards are dead,most of the hot page is low view/comment, posts are buried quickly and half the ones that do stick for a day are troll shit posts.

now i have no where to complain how bad the game is and criticize riots incompetence.  

kinda funny that a few low tier downvote bots that were probably ran in some kids basement. got a multi billion dollar company to kill their own boards since they are to cheap to install some basic anti spam on their website.

sad thing is i would not put it past riot if they planed this so they had an excuse to kill the boards...
this company truly is a disgrace.
